unnormalised: Govt. says masks are optional now, but my mom still makes me wear 2! Guess I'll be breathing like a marathon runner even at the chai stall, lol. Maybe I'll get a free checkup at AIIMS for all this forced cardio!
normalised: Government says masks are optional now, but my mom still makes me wear two! Guess I will be breathing like a marathon runner even at the chai stall, laugh out loud. Maybe I will get a free checkup at A-I-I-M-S for all this forced cardio!
